Package fr.uge.gitclout.gitanalyse

Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.gitclout.gitanalyse.DatabaseManager
@Singleton public class DatabaseManager extends Object
DatabaseManager class for managing all elements into the database.
Author:
Tagnan Tremellat.
